prompt:
SCENE: Simple, clean category theory diagram.
- Three distinct geometric shapes arranged in a triangle:
  - TOP: Circle (soft blue glow)
  - BOTTOM LEFT: Square (soft green glow)
  - BOTTOM RIGHT: Triangle (soft purple glow)
- Curved arrows connecting them:
  - Arrow from Circle to Square, pointing LEFT TO RIGHT then DOWN
  - Arrow from Square to Triangle, pointing LEFT TO RIGHT
  - Arrow from Circle to Triangle (composition path), curved, different color
- All arrow heads clearly visible on the END of each arrow
- Dark background with subtle hexagon grid

STYLE:
- Clean technical diagram with neon glow
- Minimalist but visually appealing
- Video game UI aesthetic

EXPLICIT DIRECTIONS:
- Arrows show composition direction: if f: A to B and g: B to C, show both
- Arrow heads are ON THE RIGHT/END of each arrow
- Composition arrow could be shown as dotted or different color

CONSTRAINTS:
- No text or labels
- No characters
- Original artwork only
